Symbol.Script_1D: if GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE <> 7 & GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE <> 8 then call "gs_DW_Marker" parameters all endif
Symbol.Script_FWM:
actualGUID = FROM_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
_autoID = "10638C1D-13D8-43EF-B919-B5C489C5D0EB" _startID = "8C783095-F1EB-4724-9553-106AB35BA0EC" _endID = "A71A7244-E38D-4299-88DF-0A099A587D25" gosub "removeFireExpDACH_FWM"
_startID = "A71A7244-E38D-4299-88DF-0A099A587D25" _endID = "2D634EFF-2858-4F6D-9972-F4C8526DE3D0" gosub "NewUnitSizesOption_FWM"
_startID = "2D634EFF-2858-4F6D-9972-F4C8526DE3D0" _endID = "2740DE6C-F8E8-416F-9C03-6FAC2E89B684" gosub "RectFillSettings_FWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid actualGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! removeFireExpDACH ! ============================================================================== "removeFireExpDACH_FWM": if actualGUID = _startID | actualGUID = _autoID then
if (LibraryLangCode = "CHE" | LibraryLangCode = "GER") then AC_FirePrefix = AC_FirePrefix + "E" parameters AC_FirePrefix = AC_FirePrefix endif
actualGUID = _endID endif return
! ============================================================================== ! NewUnitSizesOption ! ============================================================================== "NewUnitSizesOption_FWM": if actualGUID = _startID then iWorkUnitLinear = 10 ! DIMUNIT_PROJECT iWorkUnitSillHgt = 10 ! DIMUNIT_PROJECT
iWorkUnitLinearDecimal = 1 iWorkUnitSillHgtDecimal = 1
parameters iWorkUnitLinear = iWorkUnitLinear, iWorkUnitSillHgt = iWorkUnitSillHgt, iWorkUnitLinearDecimal = iWorkUnitLinearDecimal, iWorkUnitSillHgtDecimal = iWorkUnitSillHgtDecimal
actualGUID = _endID endif return
! ============================================================================== ! RectFillSettings ! ============================================================================== "RectFillSettings_FWM": if actualGUID = _startID then if iMarkerShape = 3 then ! SHAPE_FRAGMENT _penContour = 1 bHas = STORED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_cont_pen", _penContour)
gs_fill_pen = _penContour gs_back_pen = 0 parameters gs_fill_pen = gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen = gs_back_pen endif
actualGUID = _endID endif
return
